title: न्यूज़18 की गलत ख़बर : “सार्क देशों में पीएम मोदी का समर्थन करते हुए 5 अप्रैल को लाइटें बंद रहेगी”
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim: Light a Diya to stand in solidarity with people of #India in the fight against #COVID19. Pay tribute to all medical workers. At this difficult time, #Chinese & Indian people are standing together through thick & thin. Wish India an early victory against the epidemic. #9pm9minutepic.twitter.com/2h9pp7O21d
